column1: It's so many kinds of fucked that "let's test all the people suspected of having coronavirus for coronavirus" has somehow become a radical left-wing position, along with "any vaccine should be free, like the swine flue vaccine was"
@StarKat1138 just told me that he can't get new books because he knows the Star Wars books he owns won't remind him of Coronavirus but the new ones might
